text: 6.10: Lo 32.43; Sng 78.10; VB 11.18; 16.7; 19.2Mba gumgir ntuu khɨrɨv kaav, khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu za kha bigi gari ŋkasŋka ki Guma Bakɨme ma. Ndu zazera ŋgaravra kav, ndun tɨvi guigi guarara. Ndu rarara tugir ndu za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv mbe suaŋv, nen rargɨ kɨrie? Ndu rasɨ tugar nza vɨzi ŋgarkararie?”
